src.extension.command.main.quickpick.2.d: ❗创建一个虚拟环境 | 复制到剪贴板: `virtualenv venv`
src.extension.command.main.quickpick.3.d: ❗进入虚拟环境 | 复制到剪贴板: `venv\Scripts\activate`
src.extension.command.main.quickpick.4.d: ❗在虚拟环境中安装pyinstaller | 复制到剪贴板: `pip install pyinstaller`
src.extension.command.main.quickpick.5.d: (可选)查看安装需要的依赖 | 复制到剪贴板: `pip freeze > requirements.txt`
src.extension.command.main.quickpick.6.d: (可选)在虚拟环境中安装好所有你需要的依赖
src.extension.command.main.quickpick.7.d: (可选)在虚拟环境中运行你的主程序 | 复制到剪贴板: `python main.py`
src.extension.command.main.quickpick.8.d: 查看 .spec 文件,并且将需要打包的文件夹添加好,填写好参数.
src.extension.command.main.quickpick.9.d: ❗打包成 exe | 复制到剪贴板: `pyinstaller main.spec`
src.extension.command.main.quickpick.hin: 已复制到剪贴板 !请在终端中 粘贴指令!
